title: BJ's Burger Joint & Juice Bar
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. American style eatery with Wi-Fi. Menu has 6 kinds of veggie burgers and 6 wraps. The California grill salad is vegan suitable with brown rice with grilled veg and lemon tahini sauce. Almond milk is used in smoothies and available for drinks.
